name: Brol au Vie-Lhaj
description:
1/ Mister Mayor Greetings

Dear Madam Newcomer,

Hello.

We are very honored to welcome you to our village. As you might know, tonight will take place our annual village party. We wish these festivities to be the best. However, we took notice of some animosities coming from several villagers. As a newcomer, we thought that you could provide us with a detailed list of all the relations that connect our fellow citizens.

In order to do that, we give you this notebook where you will be able to draw connections between the citizens. When you’ll draw all these bonds, give me this notebook back and validate.

I also give you lembas bread… erm, no, for another time ; I also give you this map, showing all the nice places of our village, where you’ll be able to meet your new fellow-citizens.

Yours sincerely,

Mister Mayor

2/ Controls
  • Right Click - Cancel
  • H - Help
  • B - Open Bulletin Board
  • I - Opens Inventory
